code: import React from'react';export default function ContactFilterInput(props){var allActiveChatsProfiles=props.allActiveChatsProfiles;var setHasFilteredProfiles=props.setHasFilteredProfiles;var fetchActiveChatProfiles=props.fetchActiveChatProfiles;var setParentState=props.setParentState;var openModal=props.openModal;var setContactSearch=function setContactSearch(query){if(query===''){setHasFilteredProfiles(false);fetchActiveChatProfiles();return;}if(allActiveChatsProfiles){var filteredProfiles=allActiveChatsProfiles.filter(function(p){return p.user.username.includes(query);});setHasFilteredProfiles(true);setParentState({activeChatsProfiles:filteredProfiles});}};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"search-input-container"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{className:"search-input contact-filter-input",id:"contact-filter-input",placeholder:"Pesquisar pessoas",onChange:function onChange(e){return setContactSearch(e.target.value);}}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("i",{className:"fas fa-plus add-icon",onClick:openModal}));}
